nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_use_distances
nml_option.description: Logical flag that determines if locations of features are defined by distances or fractions. False means fractions.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in onshore_wave test case. Typical values are 40 and 100.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_layer_type
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls how the initial conditions should be generated.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_isopycnal_min_thickness
nml_option.description: minimum layer thickness
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real number, typically 0.01 to 1.0

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_ridge_depressionwave_center_frac
nml_option.description: Location of center of transition to sea surface height depression.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_ridge_depressionwave_width_frac
nml_option.description: Width of transition region to sea surface height depression.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_ridge_depressionwave_center_dist
nml_option.description: Location of center of transition to sea surface height depression.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_ridge_depressionwave_width_dist
nml_option.description: Width of transition region to sea surface height depression.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_ridge_depressionwave_amplitude
nml_option.description: Amplitude of the depression wave offshore away from shelf.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_bottom_depth
nml_option.description: Depth of the bottom of the ocean in the onshore_wave test case.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_ridge_depth
nml_option.description: Depth of the bottom of the ocean on the ridge in the over flow test case.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real value greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_slope_center_frac
nml_option.description: Location of the center of the slope. Given as a fraction of the total y domain range. Position is relative to the minimum y value.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_slope_width_frac
nml_option.description: Half width of the slope. Given as a fraction of the total y domain range.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_slope_center_dist
nml_option.description: Location of the center of the slope. Given as a distance from the minimum y value. Default is relative to a 200km domain.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_slope_width_dist
nml_option.description: Half width of the slope. Default is relative to a 200km domain.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_salinity
nml_option.description: Salinity of the water in the entire domain.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_domain_temperature
nml_option.description: Temperature of water outside of the plug.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_plug_temperature
nml_option.description: Temperature of water in plug at the southern end of the domain.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_plug_width_frac
nml_option.description: Fraction of the domain the plug should take up initially. Only in the y direction.

nml_option.name: config_onshore_wave_plug_width_dist
nml_option.description: Distance from the minimum Y value of the domain the plug should take up initially. Default is relative to a 200km domain.
